thread.title: BRIEF-Kennady Receives Final Court Approval Of Business Combination With Mountain Province

title: BRIEF-Kennady Receives Final Court Approval Of Business Combination With Mountain Province
text:
April 12, 2018 / 12:19 PM / in 6 minutes BRIEF-Kennady Receives Final Court Approval Of Business Combination With Mountain Province Reuters Staff 
April 12 (Reuters) - Mountain Province Diamonds Inc: 
* KENNADY RECEIVES FINAL COURT APPROVAL OF BUSINESS COMBINATION WITH MOUNTAIN PROVINCE 
* MOUNTAIN PROVINCE DIAMONDS INC - CO, KENNADY CURRENTLY ANTICIPATE CLOSING OF THE ARRANGEMENT TO OCCUR ON APRIL 13, 2018 - SEC FILING Source text ( bit.ly/2HwcN8O ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
